slide1.title: Training Tomorrow's Leaders for African Development
slide1.subtitle: Senghor University has been training high-level African executives in sustainable development for over 30 years.

slide2.title: Academic Excellence in Service of Africa
slide2.subtitle: Internationally recognized Master's programs taught by world-renowned experts.

slide3.title: A Network of 5000+ Graduates Worldwide
slide3.subtitle: Join a dynamic community of professionals committed to the development of the African continent.

slide4.title: Alexandria, Crossroads of Cultures and Knowledge
slide4.subtitle: Study in a unique setting, in the heart of one of the most iconic cities of the Mediterranean.

mission.title: Mission & Values
mission.subtitle: For over 30 years, we have been training tomorrow's African leaders

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Train, in French, creative executives capable of meeting the challenges of sustainable development in Africa.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Become a major player in the training and capacity building of executives in Africa and for Africa.

experience.title: The Senghor Experience
experience.description: A unique educational experience with professional immersion, creativity projects and much more.
